title-group.article-title: THE IMAGINARY ABELIAN NUMBER FIELDS OF 2-POWER DEGREES WITH IDEAL CLASS GROUPS OF EXPONENT ≤ 2

abstract.p: In this paper, assuming the Generalized Riemann Hypothesis, we determine all imaginary abelian number fields N of 2-power degrees with ideal class groups of exponents ≤ 2 for which the 2-ranks of the Galois group of N over ℚ are equal to 2.
